modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod for those who are dissatisfied with the inability to harvest meat and bones from zombies. Now you will be able to harvest zombies.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod for those who are dissatisfied with the inability to harvest meat and bones from zombies. Now you will be able to harvest [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) just like old times.

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/cw8ggyb2wz3rfo4/HarvestableZombieParts.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16571-a18-harvestable-zombie-parts/).

**Credits:** [Nanashi](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/nanashi/)
